input.sentences: there were a lot of cool costumes at the party last night .
some of the couples came in matching costumes .
a lot of them were very unique .
afterward we all got together for pictures .
output.sentences: He arrived first for the costume party.
He finally met his cousin's new girlfriend at the party in their costumes.
Some of the costumes were unique.
Yet, somehow everyone fit in, in their costumes and time flew.
The party was a great success and new friendships were formed.
